message.body: Are you around this weekend? And has nick talked to you about helping with the horses?
Yes, no :) I'm here and can do whatever, just let me know! I think Friday pm is the only time I can't do.
Haha not surprised. I'm not sure when he is leaving so let me figure that out and we can figure out our schedule. Just wanted to give you a heads up
Yes, thank you for that, haha!
So they need coverage Friday night through Monday night.
I could do Friday night, Sunday morning and Monday night if you can do all of Saturday, Sunday night and Monday morning? Hugh is coming up this weekend, otherwise I'd be happy to do everything lol.
Sounds good! I can't do Friday pm or Monday pm but everything else is fine.
Jk they only need help Friday night till Monday morning. So I'll do Friday night and all of Sunday if you can just do all of Saturday and Monday morning?
Haha sounds fine! I'll be around so don't worry about it if it's a hassle, except Friday pm :)
Ok doke, the only time that may be a hassle for me is Sunday night.
